long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐸 PEEEEP is a lightweight extension that shows you third-party emotes right in chat - easy!

👍 Looking for deeper customization of your Twitch experience? Check out the amazing features offered by FrankerFaceZ, BetterTTV, and 7TV. PEEEEP is perfect if you just want emotes to work with zero fuss.

✨ Key Features:

• 🔄 View third-party emotes directly in chat, zero configuration required.
• 🔍 Click on emotes to see the bigger version via tooltips.
• 🎨 Support for 7TV emote modifiers to create fun emote combos.

⚠️ Disclaimer: PEEEEP is an independent project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by 7TV, BetterTTV, FrankerFaceZ, or Twitch.
